# Plat Ingrédients Prix en Ariary Quantité
{{i + 1}} {{dish.name}} {{dish.ingredients}} {{dish.price}}
Total à payer 20 $
import { BasketService } from './../../basket.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; import { Component, Input, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Dish } from '../../types/dish'; @Component({ selector: 'app-content', templateUrl: './content.component.html', styleUrls: ['./content.component.scss'] }) export class ContentComponent implements OnInit { basket$: Observable = this.basketService.basket$; constructor(private basketService: BasketService) { } ngOnInit(): void { } }
